page.title: 17Attitudes
page.content: People answered a questionnaire about their attitudes to seven issues and the results are summarised below; 93% thought that the shopping facilities in the area are good. There were three issues with 75% agreement, religion was unimprotant in their lives, the bus service in the area is good and parents should support teachers and schools in the education of children. Half of the people thought that the area was unattractive, that the area did not have a good community spirit and that the police do a good job. With these last three issues about a third of the people could not make up their minds so the number who disagreed with these attitudes is small.
